lines.text: [the singer is a man in drag]
She ain't very good lookin'
That ain't all she ain't.
Excitement? Why, I got more arrows in the back of that coach than a porcupine has got stickers!
Make mine sarsparilly!
Look at these! Silk, pure silk! I'll bet her mother spun 'em!

[singing]
At last my heart's an open door / And my secret love's no secret any more.
That's better. Next time I tell a story, keep your hands in your *pockets* you toothless old buffalo!
[Bill is dressed as an Indian woman with a baby]
Gosh almighty, it's Bill Hickok!
[proceeds to laugh along with everyone else]

[hands baby over]
Here take him.
[stands up]
The next man that laughs is gonna get his head ventilated.
[silence and Bill sits down. Calamity laughs again after a few moments]
Whip, crack, away!

[song]
Well now if you've got a cutie who's a real sweet petutie, better keep it under your hat. Just remember curiosity in fables of old, killed the curious cat. Well now if you've got a laddy who's a real sugar daddy, better take in the welcoming mat. Remember there's a dozen dolls for every dan, you're not the only sweetpea in the can, so if you wanna know the way to keep your man. Keep it under your hat. Keep it under your hat.
That's a right-smart looking harness you got on there.
I got a strange feelin' somebody's bein' hustled.
This town ain't big enough! Not for me and that frilled-up, flirtin', man-rustlin' petticoat, it ain't!

[looks inside stage coach]
Is there a woman in here?
[Indians are looking at and touching Frances clothes and bag inside the stage coach]
No sir. Just Indians.

[singing]
Hi Joe / say where'd you get them fancy clothes? / I know / off some fella's laundry line. / Hi Bow / aren't you the prairie rose / Smell like a watermelon vine.
[Katie is looking in a mirror talking to herself in a dressing room]
You'd like to run away wouldn't you? Catch a train get out of this crazy town. But you can't. Your trapped. There is no train. Oh clever, clever you...
[starts to powder her face is startled by a knock and told she has five minutes. She looks in the mirror and sees her face is white with powder]
Five minutes and look at you. You haven't even got a face

[while in Chicago, sees a store window with wigs on display]
Scalps!
Enjoy the show!

[finds a gun hidden in Calamity's wedding dress]
What's this fer?
Awww... just in case any more actresses come in from Chicagy!
